name: Heat_Map_Corruption_Zone
description: Creates persistent false hot zone in heatmap analytics, corrupting customer behavior analysis
expected_result: Creates false 'hot zone' in analytics dashboard. Corrupts customer behavior analysis, product placement decisions. Persists in historical data.
limitations: Only affects cameras with heatmap software. Static IR source may be filtered as anomaly after 24 hours. Requires 10+ second persistence to register.
